event.description: Find a recursive call involving the folowing functions: Function:[ png_free_data ] defined at location [ /media/newdrive/llvm3.6/Test-code/libpng-1.2.57/png.c:364:1 ] The call relationship are as follows: Function:[ png_free_data ] calls [ png_free_data ] at location [ /media/newdrive/llvm3.6/Test-code/libpng-1.2.57/png.c:392 ]
